Welcome.Subject: Wewcome tuu Wyvewn, {{username}}! uwu

Welcome.Body: We'we supew excited tuu haz u join da Wyvewn famiwy~ wet’s gets u aww comfy comfy! owo
Welcome.ActionPrompt: Tu stawt expwowing, pwease vewify youw accy-pouncy: >w<
Welcome.LinkExpiry: Dis winky ish onwy vawid fow 30 minnyutes, nya~

Welcome.SignOff:
Cheewz n snuggwy hugz!
— Da Wyvewn Team >///<

Username.Taken: Sowwy, dat usewname ish awweady taken >w<

Username.TooLong: Usewname cant be wonger dan 15 chawactews >.<

Username.ContainsWyvern: Usewname cant haz 'wyvewn' in it, sowwy nya~
Username.BlockedPhrase: Usewname haz nawty wowdz, bad kitty! >///<

Password.TooLong: Passwuwd cant be wonger dan 64 wettiez~

Password.MissingLower: Passwuwd must haz at weast one smow wetta uwu
Password.MissingDigit: Passwuwd must haz a numbew nya~
Password.MissingSpecial: Passwuwd must haz a speshuw chawactew ✧

Email.Taken: Dis emaiw ish awweady in use, nya~ twy anotha one >w<

Email.UnresolvableDomain: Da emaiw domain '{domain}' wooks invawid, pwease twy diffewent emaiw ow ping suppowt if dis ish incowwect~

Age.InvalidBirthday: Birfday cant be in da futuwe, sowwy nya~
